channel.title: 2018 09 on Heptio Advocacy
channel.description: Recent content in 2018 09 on Heptio Advocacy

item.title: Cloud Native London
item.author: advocacy@heptio.com (Heptio Advocacy)
item.description: Kris Nova shares years of experience with managing cloud native infrastructure with Kubernetes. In this keynote you will learn about declarative infrastructure, the work being driven in upstream Kubernetes by Heptio and Google, and the philosophy behind the new hero in creating a mutating Kubernetes clusters. Link to event page
